title: Introduction to Tools
content: Pupils learn the names and basic uses of simple tools.

title: Using Our Hands
content: Children practice fine motor skills using hands for various tasks.

title: Safety First
content: Pupils learn safety rules when using tools and equipment.
examples: Wear gloves 🧤, Keep sharp tools away 🗡️
Do not run while holding scissors ✂️

title: Machines Around Us
content: Children explore simple machines and their uses in daily life.

title: Making Simple Crafts
content: Pupils learn to create simple crafts using everyday materials.

title: Drawing and Coloring
content: Children practice drawing shapes, letters, and coloring them neatly.
examples: Draw a house 🏠, Color a tree 🌳

title: Using Paper and Cardboard
content: Pupils explore paper and cardboard for creating projects and models.

title: Building Simple Structures
content: Children learn to construct simple structures using blocks or sticks.

title: Cleaning and Maintaining Tools
content: Pupils learn the importance of cleaning and keeping tools in good condition.
examples: Do not leave tools on floor

title: Technology in Daily Life
content: Children explore how technology helps in our daily lives.
examples: Fan for cooling 🌬️, Lamp for light 💡
